pages.md:
# Connecting via USB

The camera can be connected to computers and smartphones via USB.

## Connecting to Computers

> Before downloading pictures or taking pictures remotely, connect the camera to a computer and check that it functions normally.

1. Turn the computer on.

2. Adjust settings according to whether you will be copying pictures to a computer (page 280), save RAW pictures in other formats (page 284), or Saving and Loading Camera Settings (page 284).

3. Turn the camera off.

4. Connect a USB cable.

!USB Connection

> **Note:** The USB cable must be no more than 1.5 m (4.9 ft.) long and be suitable for data transfer.
